title: Create a max delivery or creative boost session

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Product GMV Max Campaign. To create a Product GMV Max Campaign and obtain the campaign ID, use /campaign/gmv_max/create/ and set shopping_ads_type to PRODUCT . To filter existing Product GMV Max Campaigns within your ad account, use /gmv_max/campaign/get/ and set filtering to {"gmv_max_promotion_types":["PRODUCT_GMV_MAX"]} .

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok Shop. To obtain the ID of the TikTok Shop that is associated with a GMV Max Campaign, use /campaign/gmv_max/info/ .

parameters.name: session
parameters.description: Details about the max delivery mode for the campaign.

parameters.name: bid_type
parameters.description: The session type. Enum values: NO_BID : max delivery session. Learn about the prerequisites for creating a max delivery session . Default value: NO_BID . Note : To create a creative boost session, see Parameters for creating a creative boost session and set bid_type to CREATIVE_NO_BID .

parameters.name: product_list
parameters.description: Details about the specific products. Max size: 1.

parameters.name: spu_id
parameters.description: The Product SPU (standard product unit) ID. To obtain the list of SPU IDs for products within a TikTok Shop, use /store/product/get/ and set ad_creation_eligible to GMV_MAX and select item_group_id values where status is AVAILABLE .

parameters.name: budget
parameters.description: The daily max delivery budget. Max delivery uses additional budget, separate from target ROI optimization budget, paced for more predictable ad spending. Your target ROI budget won’t be used for products using max delivery while max delivery is active. Value range: ≥ 10 (USD).

parameters.name: schedule_type
parameters.description: Schedule type for max delivery. Enum values: SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW : To enable the max delivery mode for the product continuously after the schedule_start_time , until the campaign scheduled end time. SCHEDULE_START_END : To enable the max delivery mode for the product between the schedule_start_time and schedule_end_time . Default value: SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW .

parameters.name: schedule_start_time
parameters.description: The start time for the max delivery mode, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). If not specified, this field will default to the current time. Note : The start time cannot be earlier than the current time. The start time should be later than or equal to the campaign start time. Your daily budget will be spent evenly throughout the day. If your max delivery duration is less than 24 hours in a given day, your full budget will still be spent. Max delivery will be active between your set start and end times for your selected products. If your campaign is still active when max delivery ends, the optimization mode for those products will automatically change to target ROI.

parameters.name: schedule_end_time Conditional
parameters.description: Required when schedule_type is SCHEDULE_START_END . Not supported when schedule_type is SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW . The end time for the max delivery mode, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). Note : The end time cannot be earlier than the current time. The end time should be earlier or equal to the campaign end time.

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Product GMV Max Campaign. To create a Product GMV Max Campaign and obtain the campaign ID, use /campaign/gmv_max/create/ and set shopping_ads_type to PRODUCT . To filter existing Product GMV Max Campaigns within your ad account, use /gmv_max/campaign/get/ and set filtering to {"gmv_max_promotion_types":["PRODUCT_GMV_MAX"]} .

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok Shop. To obtain the ID of the TikTok Shop that is associated with a GMV Max Campaign, use /campaign/gmv_max/info/ .

parameters.name: session
parameters.description: Details about the creative boost settings for the campaign.

parameters.name: bid_type
parameters.description: Session type. Enum values: CREATIVE_NO_BID : creative boost session. Learn about the prerequisites for creating a creative boost session . Note : To create a max delivery session, see Parameters for creating a max delivery session and set bid_type to NO_BID or leave bid_type unspecified.

parameters.name: product_list
parameters.description: Details about the specific products. Max size: 1.

parameters.name: spu_id
parameters.description: The Product SPU (standard product unit) ID. To obtain the list of SPU IDs for products within a TikTok Shop, use /store/product/get/ and set ad_creation_eligible to GMV_MAX and select item_group_id values where status is AVAILABLE .

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the video to enable creative boost for. To obtain the list of TikTok videos within an existing GMV Max Campaign, use /gmv_max/report/get/ and retrieve the creative-level data . You can get the TikTok video ID through the metric item_id . Ensure that the creative_delivery_status of the video is not AUTHORIZATION_NEEDED , EXCLUDED , REJECTED , or UNAVAILABLE .

parameters.name: budget
parameters.description: The daily creative boost budget. Creative boost utilizes budget, separate from campaign budget, paced throughout your schedule for more predictable ad spending. Creative boost budget isn't included in calculations for your campaign's ROI protection. Value range: ≥ 10 (USD).

parameters.name: schedule_type
parameters.description: Schedule type for creative boost. Enum values: SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW : To enable creative boost for the product continuously after the current time, until the campaign scheduled end time. SCHEDULE_START_END : To enable creative boost for the product between the current time and schedule_end_time . Default value: SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW .

parameters.name: schedule_end_time Conditional
parameters.description: Required when schedule_type is SCHEDULE_START_END . Not supported when schedule_type is SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW . The end time for creative boost, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). Note : The end time cannot be earlier than the current time. The end time should be earlier or equal to the campaign end time.
